title: Custom Irrigation Pipe Trailer With Assorted Irrigation Steel Pipes Included
item_description:
Custom Irrigation Pipe Trailer With Assorted Irrigation Steel Pipes Included

No Loading Assistance: Buyers are responsible for all aspects of removal. Please bring all necessary tools, equipment, and crew to pick up your items.

  • Width: 97.5”
  • Length: 420”
  • Height: 79”

Note: This item has been for off-road use only, and is not registered or titled with DMV. Buyer will get a Bill of Sale only, 1-2 weeks after removal. The Buyer is fully responsible for the registration process, transfer, fees, taxes, and inspections due to DMV to register/title this vehicle in Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a new title/VIN/License, etc. Please bid accordingly.
